1.name: Blood Pool
1.details:
When Blood kills an enemy with any of his abilities, he increases his maximum health by 4 permanently. Large minions and monsters will increase his maximum health by 8 and enemy Hero will increase his maximum health by 16 instead.

Blood uses his health to cast abilities instead of mana.

2.name: Blood Drain
2.details:
In sword mode, Blood stabs in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit and healing himself (scaling with magical power) plus a percentage of his missing health.

In staff mode, Blood drains the blood from a target enemy Hero, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) over 3 seconds and heals himself (scaling with magical power) each 0.5 second over the same duration.

In addition, Blood also gains increased movement speed during the drain.

3.name: Blood Sword / Blood Staff
3.details:
Blood shapeshifts his weapon into either a sword or a staff, gaining different abilities.

When switching to a sword, his basic attack has shorter range but deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power). Moreover, his first basic attack within 6 seconds after shapeshifting will greatly slow the target for 0.5 seconds.

When switching to a staff, his basic attack gains additional range. Moreover, his first basic attack within 6 seconds after shapeshifting deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power) and reduces the targetâ€™s magic resistance for 3 seconds.

4.name: Death Grasp
4.details:
In sword mode, Blood dashes in a target direction and sends out a claw, briefly pulling the first enemy hit to him and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power).

In staff mode, Blood summons a claw in a target direction, pulling all enemies within the path towards him and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power).

5.name: Night Feast
5.details:
In Sword mode, Blood channels for 1 second then sends out a number of Blood Bat each second for the next 6 seconds. Each Blood Bat will fly to a nearby enemy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and heals himself (scaling with magical power).

In Staff mode, Blood channels for 1 second then sends out a number of Blood Bats each second for the next 6 seconds. Each Blood Bat will fly to a nearby enemy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies and fearing them for 0.5 seconds.

Blood Bat will prioritise enemy Hero and closer enemy. The number of Blood Bats will increase based on this ability’s level.
